item.title: Liquidsoap: New bugtracker
item.description: Sourcefabric was kind enough to provide us with a better tracker for reporting bugs. Please use this one from now on!

item.title: Liquidsoap: Savonet at ON2: Test Signals
item.description: Savonet will be at the ON2: Test Signals conference in Berlin on Oct 22-23. We gave a presentation and workshop on Liquidsoap. More…

item.title: Liquidsoap: New article
item.description: We wrote a new article (in English this time) describing Liquidsoap and some of the new features of the upcoming 1.0 version. More…

item.title: Liquidsoap: Beta 1.0.0 release!
item.description: We finally issued the first 1.0.0 beta release! It came with the 0.9.3 bugfix version that closes the 0.9 line. More…
